name: Match the Timer
description:
You are a litle cute creature that has to complete the level in time.

Everytime it fails, he respawns at the beginning of the level. Help the creature to get Free and beat the timer.

You play with: w & d

You Jump with the spacebar.

Have fun beating the levels!

Credits to Anokolisa https://anokolisa.itch.io/basic-140-tiles-grassland-and-mines, https://www.patreon.com/Anokolisa
